Arizona Winter School 2016: Analytic Methods in Arithmetic Geometry

AWS 2016 will be held March 12-16, 2016 at the University of Arizona in Tucson, AZ.

  • Schedule and other important information
  • Local directions
  • Organizers: Alina Bucur and David Zureick-Brown (main program), with Bryden Cais, Mirela Ciperiani, and Romyar Sharifi.
